TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IsolatedStorageFileStream extends System.IO.FileStream

summary.span: 公開隔離儲存區內的檔案。

span.span: Exposes a file within isolated storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個類別來讀取、 寫入和建立隔離儲存區中的檔案。Use this class to read, write and create files in isolated storage. 由於此類別會擴充，您可以使用的執行個體在大部分情況下其中可能用，例如建構或。Since this class extends , you can use an instance of in most situations where a might otherwise be used, such as to construct a or . 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式無法使用隔離儲存區。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 請改用 `Windows.Storage` 應用程式開發介面內含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空間中的應用程式資料類別來儲存本機資料和檔案。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Windows 開發人員中心的 [應用程式資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式，示範如何使用和將資料寫入至隔離儲存區檔案。The following console application demonstrates how you can use and to write data to an Isolated Storage file. 使用者已登入要求。The user is requested to log in. 如果使用者是新的使用者，會記錄新聞 URL 和運動 URL 做為隔離儲存區中的個人喜好設定。If the user is a new user, a News URL and a Sports URL are recorded as personal preferences in Isolated Storage. 如果使用者是傳回的使用者，會顯示使用者的目前設定。If the user is a returning user, the user's current preferences are displayed. 在這個命名空間所使用的程式碼範例會顯示在此範例應用程式的內容。The code examples used throughout this namespace are presented in the context of this sample application. 您可以使用[Storeadm.exe （隔離儲存區工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/storeadm-exe-isolated-storage-tool.md)公用程式來列出並移除使用此主控台應用程式建立的隔離儲存區檔案。You can use the [Storeadm.exe (Isolated Storage Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/storeadm-exe-isolated-storage-tool.md) utility to list and remove the Isolated Storage files that are created with this console application. [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 開啟 的唯一方法是使用它的一個建構函式進行。

span.span: The only way to open an is by using one of its constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 物件的新執行個體，這個執行個體可以存取在指定的 中 所指定的檔案。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an object giving access to the file designated by in the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用隔離儲存區的範圍是由目前執行組件的識別，以及正在執行的應用程式定義域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存放區會保持開啟狀態的存留期只針對物件。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 若要指定不同的隔離儲存區的範圍，或允許保持開啟存放區 (因此多個物件可以從它開啟)，使用建構函式可接受的形式物件。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案、 使用現有的等等。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，可能會無法解譯字元，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown.

The is .
The directory in does not exist.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class giving access to the file designated by , in the specified , with the kind of requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用隔離儲存區的範圍是由目前執行組件的識別，以及正在執行的應用程式定義域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存放區會保持開啟狀態的存留期只針對物件。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 若要指定不同的隔離儲存區的範圍，或允許保持開啟存放區 (因此多個物件可以從它開啟)，使用建構函式可接受的形式物件。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案或使用現有的。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`參數包含唯讀的讀取/寫入，和唯寫。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取以不同的文化設定相同的字元時，字元可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案、 使用現有的等等。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取以不同的文化設定相同的字元時，字元可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用隔離儲存區的範圍是由目前執行組件的識別，以及正在執行的應用程式定義域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存放區會保持開啟狀態的存留期只針對物件。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 若要指定不同的隔離儲存區的範圍，或允許保持開啟存放區 (因此多個物件可以從它開啟)，使用建構函式可接受的形式物件。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，可能會無法解譯字元，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案或使用現有的。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`參數包含唯讀的讀取/寫入，和唯寫。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取以不同的文化設定相同的字元時，字元可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用隔離儲存區的範圍是由目前執行組件的識別，以及正在執行的應用程式定義域。The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running. 此存放區會保持開啟狀態的存留期只針對物件。This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the object. 若要指定不同的隔離儲存區的範圍，或允許保持開啟存放區 (因此多個物件可以從它開啟)，使用建構函式可接受的形式物件。To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an object. `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案或使用現有的。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`參數包含唯讀的讀取/寫入，和唯寫。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取以不同的文化設定相同的字元時，字元可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class giving access to the file designated by , in the specified , with the specified file , using the file sharing mode specified by , and in the context of the specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案或使用現有的。The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used. `access`參數包含唯讀的讀取/寫入，和唯寫。The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取以不同的文化設定相同的字元時，字元可能會無法解譯，並可能會導致擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and can cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為 true。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to true. 叫用與`disposing`設為 false。 invokes with `disposing` set to false. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，讓所有緩衝資料全部寫入檔案。

span.span: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush ()
public: override void Flush();
override this.Flush : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，讓所有緩衝資料全部寫入檔案。

span.span: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為緩衝區可以用來讀取或寫入，但是兩者不能同時執行兩個函式。Because a buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but not both simultaneously, performs two functions. 首先，任何之前寫入緩衝區的資料複製到檔案，並清除緩衝區。First, any data previously written to the buffer is copied to the file and the buffer is cleared. 第二個，如果是`true`資料先前已從檔案複製到讀取的緩衝區，檔案中目前的位置也會減少在緩衝區中讀取的位元組數目。Second, if is `true` and data was previously copied from the file to the buffer for reading, the current position within the file is decremented by the number of unread bytes in the buffer. 然後會清除緩衝區。The buffer is then cleared. 使用方法多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。Use the method overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush (bool flushToDisk);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush(bool flushToDisk) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Flush (flushToDisk As Boolean)

override this.Flush : bool -> unit

span.span: to flush all intermediate file buffers; otherwise, .

span.span: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file, and also clears all intermediate file buffers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。Use this overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.

summary.span: 防止其他處理程序讀取或寫入資料流。

span.span: Prevents other processes from reading from or writing to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 鎖定某個範圍的檔案資料流可讓執行緒的鎖定的處理程序的獨佔存取該範圍的檔案資料流。Locking a range of a file stream gives the threads of the locking process exclusive access to that range of the file stream.

span.span: or is negative.
The file is closed.

exception.span: 處理序無法存取檔案，因為其他處理序鎖定了該檔案的一部分。

span.span: The process cannot access the file because another process has locked a portion of the file.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);
override this.Read : byte[] * int * int -> int

span.span: The buffer to read.

param.name: offset
param.span: 開始寫入緩衝區的位移。

span.span: The offset in the buffer at which to begin writing.

param.name: count
param.span: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 將位元組從目前緩衝的 物件複製到陣列。

span.span: Copies bytes from the current buffered object to an array.

returns.span: 讀取到 中的位元組總數。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the .

returns.span: 如果目前無法提供那麼多的位元組數目，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數，或如果已經到達資料流結尾，則為零。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `buffer`參數可以是的執行個體類別或其中一個下列類型的陣列： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或。The `buffer` parameter can be an instance of the class, or an array of one of the following types: , , , , , , , , , , or . `offset`參數緩衝區中要開始寫入 （索引緩衝區中） 中指定的位元組位移，`count`參數會提供將會從這個資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in buffer at which to begin writing (index in the buffer), and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes that will be read from this stream. 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是個位元組，則為零的實際數目。The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached. 如果在讀取的作業成功，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read. 如果發生例外狀況，目前資料流的位置不變。If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged. 方法視為`buffer`做為區塊的位元組，不論其實際型別參數。The method treats the `buffer` parameter as a block of bytes, regardless of its actual type. 同樣地，`offset`和`count`參數一律會以位元組為單位指定。Likewise, the `offset` and `count` parameters are always specified in bytes. 如`buffer`這以外的位元組陣列的參數，表示曲線索引必須乘以項目大小，以位元組為單位來形成的正確值`offset`或`count`。For `buffer` parameters other than byte arrays, this means that an element index must be multiplied by the element size in bytes to form a correct value for `offset` or `count`. 方法會傳回零，只有當資料流結尾為止。The method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached. 在其他情況下，一律會讀取至少一個位元組資料流後再傳回。In all other cases, always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning. 如果沒有資料可從物件呼叫時，方法會封鎖直到至少一個位元組的資料可能會傳回。If no data is available from the object upon a call to , the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定`value`小於目前的長度物件、 資料流遭截斷。If the specified `value` is less than the current length of the object, the stream is truncated. 如果指定`value`大於目前長度的資料流，擴充的資料流。If the specified `value` is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded. 如果展開資料流時，舊之間的新長度的資料流的內容會是未定義。If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are undefined. 若要使用這個方法，物件必須支援寫入和搜尋。In order to use this method, an object must support both writing and seeking.

span.span: is a negative number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`buffer`開始閱讀，而`count`參數會提供這將寫入的位元組數目物件。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in the `buffer` at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to this object. 如果作業成功時，目前位置物件前移寫入的位元組數目。If the write operation is successful, the current position of the object is advanced by the number of bytes written. 如果發生例外狀況，目前的位置物件並未變更。If an exception occurs, the current position of the object is unchanged.
